attributes.action: Reduce current levels of benefit by some 10% to reflect the hardships faced by working people in the present economic climate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current economic climate is causing significant financial hardship to working families, with higher fuel prices affecting all those that need to use any form of transport in order to attend their work, never mind increasing mortgage costs, etc.
The significant amount of people within this country who are on State Benefits are largely exempt from these types of pressure.
Why should they not feel the same economic pressures as we workers, and allow taxation levels to be reduced due to the reduction in Government spend?
